definition: of or relating to or characteristic of England or its culture or people, (sports) the spin given to a ball by striking it on one side or releasing it with a sharp twist
details:
adjective
- of or relating to or characteristic of England or its culture or people
= example: of or relating to or characteristic of England or its culture or people
- of or relating to the English language
noun
- (sports) the spin given to a ball by striking it on one side or releasing it with a sharp twist
= synonyms: side
